summary: Set up home in the woods!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#008000][font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif][size=6][center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58805-1-1412635336.png[/img][/center]
Description[/size][/font][/color]
 
Adds a new player home, themed as a hidden forest area decorated using natural resources.
I made this because I like player homes which arent too busy, everything is close by and I don't have to mess about.  You can go in do your business and out again without navigating many rooms and hallways :)
 
Comes with handy utilities; 
[list][*]a bed[/*]
[*]forge anvil[/*]
[*]workbench[/*]
[*]sharpening wheel[/*]
[*]alchemy bench[/*]
[*]enchantment bench[/*]
[*]cooking pot[/*]
[*]wood chopping block[/*]
[*]storage[/*]
[*]shelving[/*]
[*]pickable ingredients and critters[/*]
[/list]
 
Also a few bonus items;
 
[list][*][size=4]A spell tome for "Spriggan Spray", a concentration spell which damages and absorbs health[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]A Spriggan Mask which grants 50% frost resistance and 30% heal rate (light armour, 15 ar, 2 wg)[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Some scrolls to conjure a spriggan[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Some "Fatal Poison" vials[/size][/*]
[/list]
 
 
[color=#008000][size=6]Location[/size][/color]
 
Near Cradlecrush Rock (follow the river east of Whiterun, through the giants' camp after the tall waterfall), there will be an obelisk which is the door.
 
 
[color=#008000][size=6]Installation[/size][/color]
 
Place files in the data folder
 
 
[color=#008000][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]
 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32763/]Angilla for Forest Throne[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26247/]MyFirstPony for Spriggan Mask[/url]
 
 
[color=#008000][size=6]Feedback[/size][/color]
 
Always welcome, post your feedback on my page, if you think I could make it better let me know
author: Ironman5000
